com.mjun.mtransition

接口 ITransitional

  • 所有已知实现类:
    MTransitionPage, MTransitionView

    public interface ITransitional

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onTransitEnd()
      动画结束时回调 Callback when Transition end
      void onTransitProgress(long playTime, float progress)
      动画执行时回调 Callback when Transition is executed
      void onTransitStart()
      动画开始时回调 Callback when Transition start

    • 方法详细资料

      • onTransitProgress

        void onTransitProgress(long playTime,
                       float progress)
        动画执行时回调 Callback when Transition is executed
        参数:
        playTime - 动画已经执行的时长 The time of long the Transition has been performed
        progress - 动画已经执行的进度 The progress of the Transition has been performed

      • onTransitStart

        void onTransitStart()
        动画开始时回调 Callback when Transition start

      • onTransitEnd

        void onTransitEnd()
        动画结束时回调 Callback when Transition end
